ability.Flame Shield: This Pokemon takes 50% less damage from all attacks but loses 1/8 of its max HP at the end of each turn.

Inferno Wing.effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

Blazing Claw.effect: Has a higher critical hit ratio.

Eagle Dive.effect: The user recovers half the HP lost by the target.

Flame Storm.effect: Lowers the target's Defense by 2 stages.

Sky Inferno.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to 1/3 of the HP lost by the target.
